root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 4-1-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: The indicator is available at national level and by sex. ([First cycle: Total, Women, Men]; [Cycle 4: Total, Women, Men]; [General and educational post-basic: National, Women, Men])

L'indicateur est disponible au niveau national et par sexe. ([Premier cyle: Total, Femmes, Hommes]; [Cycle 4: Total, Femmes, Hommes]; [Post-fondamental général et pédagogique: National, Femmes, Hommes])
